GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9.14 to before v4.9.320
GSD.description:
ext4: fix bug_on ext4_mb_use_inode_pa

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.320 by commit 6880fb2e64331b9fdc85d3f32b1d7e81ad8703f1, it was introduced in version v4.9.14 by commit fc6c2da174edd7a7b760b12c60d432d300e05cca. For more details please see the references link.
